questions.text: Why does the speaker apologise about the seats?
options: There are not enough of them.
Some of them are very close together.
correctOption: Some of them are very close together.

questions.text: What does the speaker say about the age of volunteers?
options: The age of volunteers is less important than other factors.
Young volunteers are less reliable than older ones.
Most volunteers are about 60 years old.
correctOption: The age of volunteers is less important than other factors.

questions.text: What does the speaker say about training?
options: It is conducted by a manager.

questions.text: Which TWO issues does the speaker ask the audience to consider before they apply to be volunteers?
